content:
To actually complete an action item in less than a week: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xY2Qqoj39Fcw6TRNoYFlKgL9z9XMSHw0hQ2wotJzhSg/edit#gid=1320911392

The above is the list of error/warning/info message changes we agreed to last time. There are probably some more that have been added to the code, but if we can get these fixed, that'd be a great start.
I'm not sure that this is allowed (completing the task so quickly). Will definitely need to be discussed...
